text: Luther 'Red' Roundtree, (born August 4, 1905 in Mount Pleasant, Texas - died April 30, 1990) was an American plectrum banjo player and co-founder of The Banjo Kings in 1951, an American banjo band. ==External links== *Banjo Kings site Category:1905 births Category:1990 deaths Category:American banjoists Category:American male musicians Category:20th-century American musicians Category:20th-century American male musicians
title: Red Roundtree
